class_notes: JM students only. Per ABA rules, JD students cannot receive credit for online JM classes
course_description:
This course will review risk management, internal and public regulation of business interests, including:
-developing compliance plans for different types of compliance
-review of forms of compliance regimes (e.g., HR, financial regulation, OSHA, etc.) 
-principles of risk management
sections: Class Nbr: 5178, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: J. Carter, Status: Open
